name: Volopay
headline: Brex for South East Asia - Corporate cards & automated payments.
description:
Volopay is a modern spend management platform that saves companies time and money by giving visibility & control to every aspect of business spending. With Volopay, finance and accounting teams can control expense requests and approvals, make bill payments (domestic/cross-border), manage company cards, and reconcile all accounting on one platform.

Volopay completely eliminates the need for expense reports and reimbursements while giving everyone in the company a card to use. We worked in an offshore dev centre in the past and it took 2 months to get our reimbursements and 4 weeks to make any purchase as there was just one corporate card for the entire company and clunky bill payments solutions offered by the banks. 

Among our customers are Reddoorz (OYO of South East Asia), Dathena (biggest data security co in Singapore) and Beam (APAC’s leading micro-mobility player).

founders.name: Rajith Shaji, Founder
founders.description:
Founder & CEO of Volopay. Led product and growth teams at fintechs like MatchMove(biggest card issuance company in South East Asia), MoneySmart and BankBazaar (funded by Amazon).

Rajesh and I met at MoneysSmart - the Credit Karma in Singapore where Rajith led product management and Rajesh was a tech lead, where they built Singapore’s first car insurance digital brokerage and the integration with all major insurance providers.

founders.name: Rajesh Raikwar, Founder
founders.description: A polyglot programmer and passionate about technologies, and above all, an entrepreneur at heart. For the better part of my career, I've been involved with Fintechs. I see a lot of potentials to improve and grow in the same. Currently focusing on solving the SME business expensing problem with the help of smart corporate cards.

The financial control centre to manage
# 
spen|
A modern business account to save money with corporate cards, credit, money transfers, expense reimbursements, and automated accounting—all in one place.
![Fastest Implementation - G2](https://images.volopay.com/yecd2j3yrjhqeqh26m05t87dk8cl)
![Best support small business - G2](https://images.volopay.com/1dlasmmhkxa3mv3q0s1u2x4fmpjg)
![Leader Business G2 - 2025](https://images.volopay.com/r3rbvufgm3npstzpo753glfr2gkk)
![Easiest setup G2 - 2025](https://images.volopay.com/4aas2csvbh2xuepk0wqllp5bmzgc)
![Easiest Admin G2 - 2025](https://images.volopay.com/jrsrl2a18jhssh0bwil8ccoy3uiv)
![Volopay dashboard](https://images.volopay.com/bqpvp06acxrylks8ys5aa0wltsl1)
Trusted by finance teams at startups to enterprises
![UrbanCompany logo](https://images.volopay.com/ok581i6b7n8c7n4a3lc59g05sudc)
![Bluestone logo](https://images.volopay.com/xbsh9s9u57q6oio26bz6n2bu9iu2)
![Porter logo](https://images.volopay.com/67taexumrlupy4ik52h0ahpa1pb7)
![Dunzo logo](https://images.volopay.com/dprj9t6gasfdvm8sn3rwzzj7py4g)
![MPL logo](https://images.volopay.com/ilr6goe1b0uv6bz9r17m0syz82i2)
![Zoho logo](https://images.volopay.com/u9vq2mxjz90g6gqvzxhq8md8qbem)
![Polygon logo](https://images.volopay.com/u5ie7d3cuc5u6i98fa03wuphf0uo)
![FCM logo](https://images.volopay.com/9ww3rqsjmlp7el0ykrxzf587bn1k)
## A fully integrated suite of financial tools
Volopay is a purpose-built spend management platform that helps you escape painful admin work, lack of control and blinkered visibility. We bring together everything that's required to make payments for a business ranging from software subscriptions to petty cash, business travel to online advertising, employee reimbursements to vendor payouts.
![Volopay dashboard](https://images.volopay.com/bh2cvjd2qirc6wmpkpomvcf6oo8b)
## Smart and secure payments
Create unlimited virtual corporate cards to manage your subscriptions, pay vendors, and make other online expenses. 
﻿Give our physical corporate cards to your employees who travel and need to meet for client lunches and dinners.
![Corporate cards for payment](https://images.volopay.com/ptu2el2dxzegef4ul47115jfxu6l)
## Maximize efficiency, minimize complexity
Businesses that know exactly where each penny of their budget is spent are the ones that can optimize company spending. 
﻿Volopay’s system tracks all corporate card and bill pay transactions in real-time on a single dashboard. This gives you a complete picture + detailed breakdown of business expenses.
![Expense tracking and visibility](https://images.volopay.com/rgf4jr1r8xldpovxd4le5678ax5n)
## Simplify spending with corporate cards
Issue physical & virtual cards to employees. Control, track and set spending rules for each card issued. Be it buisness travel or online subscription management, corporate cards will help you manage them all.
### Corporate physical card
Be it commute payments for business travel or any other expenses; use widely accepted Volopay VISA cards for all your business spending needs.
[Learn more ](https://www.volopay.com/<https:/www.volopay.com/employee-physical-cards/>)
### Corporate virtual cards
Create unlimited virtual cards using our platform. They are perfect for making online payments and managing SaaS subscriptions and vendor payments. 
[Learn more ](https://www.volopay.com/<https:/www.volopay.com/virtual-cards/>)
## Automation to streamline your payables
Streamline your accounts payable process with Volopay’s automation features like scheduling and creating recurring payments for vendors. 
﻿Pay domestically and internationally without any hassle using our multi-currency wallets.
![Accounts payable automation](https://images.volopay.com/9n38vez4qptvis5msq10t80zorjk)
## Advanced multi-level approval workflows
Invoice payments are prone to many types of fraudulent activity and errors that can cause your business to lose money. 
﻿With Volopay’s multi-level approval system, you can set up to 5 levels of approvers for payments of different ranges to verify and approve payments before they are processed.
![Multi-level approval workflows](https://images.volopay.com/frz9i1tjcz7ggwczbsp83lwonzy2)
## Reimburse out-of-pocket expenses
Employees hate saving receipts to create expense reports, waiting till the end of the month to get reimbursements, and finance teams surely don’t enjoy loads of paperwork on their desks. 
﻿Switch to Volopay for real-time expense claim submission through our mobile app and zero paperwork.
![Easy employee reimbursement](https://images.volopay.com/koj0cbwzgy4joitgyd2tbqgby4jd)
## Make local & foreign money transfers
Send money to more than 130 countries worldwide with SWIFT & non-SWIFT payment options. Process your vendor payouts and employee reimbursements easier than ever before, at the lowest possible rates!
### Vendor payouts
Use our bill pay module to schedule and make recurring payments to your local and international vendors.
[Learn more ](https://www.volopay.com/<https:/www.volopay.com/vendor-payouts/>)
### Employee Reimbursement
Make faster reimbursements using Volopay’s mobile app. Submit claims in real-time & avoid hefty paperwork.
[Learn more ](https://www.volopay.com/<https:/www.volopay.com/employee-reimbursement/>)
## Seamless integrations, Simplified accounting
Volopay makes accounting your business expenses as easy as making the payments themselves. 
﻿With native integrations to industry-leading tools like Netsuite, Xero, Quickbooks, Tally, MYOB, and Deskera, you can be sure that all your accounting books stay up to date with your Volopay ledger thanks to periodic automated syncing. 
![](https://images.volopay.com/zjo5bpz0sx28migcq7l4djz2eq8p)[Connect](https://www.volopay.com/<https:/www.volopay.com/xero-with-volopay/?utm_medium=organic&utm_source=google&utm_campaign=brand&utm_term=global&utm_content=home>)
![](https://images.volopay.com/u0eazup9tlg6u9g3iijld0ikw3rd)[Connect](https://www.volopay.com/<https:/www.volopay.com/quick-books-with-volopay/?utm_medium=organic&utm_source=google&utm_campaign=brand&utm_term=global&utm_content=home>)
![netsuit](https://images.volopay.com/td2lfoiqrgkx5zunx5dbnzsg2663)[Connect](https://www.volopay.com/<https:/www.volopay.com/netsuite-with-volopay/?utm_medium=organic&utm_source=google&utm_campaign=brand&utm_term=global&utm_content=home>)
## Financial stack for business
No more switching between multiple bank accounts and tools to run your smart business. We have combined great software with every service you are using a bank for, to produce a state-of-the-art financial platform.
Corporate Cards
Empower your employees with physical and virtual cards
Expense Management
Manage and track every dollar that leaves your company
Business Bank Account
Open a global account with multi-currency payments
Accounts Payables
Manage vendors, approve invoices and automate payments
Accounting Automation
Save hours daily, and close your books faster every month
Integrations
Integrate with the all the tools and software that you use daily
## Business with confidence
### Licensed partners
Your money is held in secure accounts via escrow arrangements with trusted, licensed partners, which are subject to heavy regulation and compliance procedures as per local markets.
### Trust and safety
Your funds are held separate from ours, our partners, and also our other clients’ funds. The money in the accounts is not available to any of our creditors, our banks or third parties.
### SOC 2 compliant – Ensuring top-tier data security
SOC 2 compliance demonstrates the rigorous security controls implemented by an organization to protect customer data, minimize breaches, and uphold the highest industry standards for data privacy and trust.
### ISO & PCI DSS Compliant
We're fully compliant and verified in our standards of information security management. The ISO 27001 ensure that our infrastructure and technology protect your information with utmost care. 
﻿Additionally, the PCI DSS specifically certifies us to safeguard user data related to corporate cards. 
## Customer stories
[View all](https://www.volopay.com/<https:/www.volopay.com/customers/>)
﻿
Volopay provides your business with the perfect financial control centre. Don't take our word, let our customers tell you how we empower their organisation.
![BukuWarung logo](https://images.volopay.com/zh4phak1jcjuaujb3c4a4pbcdwvz)
BukuWarung
Volopay helped BukuWarung in managing their expenses across different countries.
![Deputy logo](https://images.volopay.com/xj0cv5esee6iofy87zj81d1yodji)
Deputy
Volopay helped Deputy smoothly integrate with an accounting system.
![AdCombo logo](https://images.volopay.com/lr8z8elit6j16t5ri65a14ifv05k)
AdCombo
Using Volopay, AdCombo eliminated the hurdles of cash flow management.
##### Supported by
We are proud to be supported by world's leading investors, founders and senior leadership of world's leading companies

## They loved Volopay, you will too
![m-View testimonial](https://images.volopay.com/bk7vheunc5f1hdn4ht6u7jrztl7q)
Volopay enables m-View to manage and control our recurring expenses by creating spend limits on suppliers or certain categories.
![White background](https://images.volopay.com/hj4af46jkxqez4c52s1rbbcwm5kd)
Elleanor Vagg
Senior financial accountant, m-View
![Video thumbnail](https://images.volopay.com/rp2rsknekgw336jfv2z5zelnb5v4)
Play video
Volopay's corporate cards helped us eliminate the need to use a single card for all the business expenses, thereby bringing better visibility and accountability into spending.
![White background](https://images.volopay.com/qxn35am1gn4dn11gkd97v89opbx6)
Arne Hartmann
Founder & CEO, Amalan International
![EdgeRed Testimonial](https://images.volopay.com/ql9suaza0xwwb5yt0akpc60d8aor)
The Volopay platform has made creating a digital card easy. We can easily set up a new card with a set budget and our team member can use that to organize events.
![White background](https://images.volopay.com/rhh8ydmfjqnx6t0m035vwv9vawgr)
Monica Ly
Co-Founder, EdgeRed
## Bring Volopay to your business
[Get started now](https://www.volopay.com/<https:/ww.volopay.co/sign-up>)
![CTA Image - Volopay](https://images.volopay.com/kfbpbh8m8floh8r71x4wg2axu9ps)
![Volopay](https://images.volopay.com/njrpmm5wabz4szijdg8a96y4butw)

## Reimburse out-of-pocket expenses
Employees hate saving receipts to create expense reports, waiting till the end of the month to get reimbursements, and finance teams surely don’t enjoy loads of paperwork on their desks. 
﻿Switch to Volopay for real-time expense claim submission through our mobile app and zero paperwork.
![Easy employee reimbursement⟨31⟩]
## Make local & foreign money transfers
Send money to more than 130 countries worldwide with SWIFT & non-SWIFT payment options. Process your vendor payouts and employee reimbursements easier than ever before, at the lowest possible rates!
### Vendor payouts
Use our bill pay module to schedule and make recurring payments to your local and international vendors.
Learn more ⟨32⟩
### Employee Reimbursement
Make faster reimbursements using Volopay’s mobile app. Submit claims in real-time & avoid hefty paperwork.
Learn more ⟨33⟩
## Seamless integrations, Simplified accounting
Volopay makes accounting your business expenses as easy as making the payments themselves. 
﻿With native integrations to industry-leading tools like Netsuite, Xero, Quickbooks, Tally, MYOB, and Deskera, you can be sure that all your accounting books stay up to date with your Volopay ledger thanks to periodic automated syncing. 
![](https://images.volopay.com/zjo5bpz0sx28migcq7l4djz2eq8p)Connect⟨34⟩
![](https://images.volopay.com/u0eazup9tlg6u9g3iijld0ikw3rd)Connect⟨35⟩
![netsuit⟨36⟩]Connect⟨37⟩
## Financial stack for business
No more switching between multiple bank accounts and tools to run your smart business. We have combined great software with every service you are using a bank for, to produce a state-of-the-art financial platform.
Corporate Cards
Empower your employees with physical and virtual cards
Expense Management
Manage and track every dollar that leaves your company
Business Bank Account
Open a global account with multi-currency payments
Accounts Payables
Manage vendors, approve invoices and automate payments
Accounting Automation
Save hours daily, and close your books faster every month
Integrations
Integrate with the all the tools and software that you use daily
## Business with confidence
### Licensed partners
Your money is held in secure accounts via escrow arrangements with trusted, licensed partners, which are subject to heavy regulation and compliance procedures as per local markets.
### Trust and safety
Your funds are held separate from ours, our partners, and also our other clients’ funds. The money in the accounts is not available to any of our creditors, our banks or third parties.
### SOC 2 compliant – Ensuring top-tier data security
SOC 2 compliance demonstrates the rigorous security controls implemented by an organization to protect customer data, minimize breaches, and uphold the highest industry standards for data privacy and trust.
### ISO & PCI DSS Compliant
We're fully compliant and verified in our standards of information security management. The ISO 27001 ensure that our infrastructure and technology protect your information with utmost care. 
﻿Additionally, the PCI DSS specifically certifies us to safeguard user data related to corporate cards. 
## Customer stories
View all⟨38⟩
﻿
Volopay provides your business with the perfect financial control centre. Don't take our word, let our customers tell you how we empower their organisation.
![BukuWarung logo⟨39⟩]
BukuWarung
Volopay helped BukuWarung in managing their expenses across different countries.
![Deputy logo⟨40⟩]
Deputy

![AdCombo logo⟨41⟩]

##### Supported by
We are proud to be supported by world's leading investors, founders and senior leadership of world's leading companies
![Antler Logo⟨42⟩]

## They loved Volopay, you will too

generated_description:
**Volopay Overview**

Founded in 2019 and based in Singapore, Volopay positions itself as the Brex for Southeast Asia, aiming to revolutionize business spending through its modern spend management platform. You can think of it as a comprehensive financial control center tailored for businesses, whether they’re just starting out or already scaling. With a lean team of 11 and having participated in Y Combinator's Batch S20, Volopay is shaking things up in the fintech scene with its array of financial solutions.

**What Volopay Does**

Volopay offers a suite of tools designed to streamline corporate spending, automate payments, and provide comprehensive visibility across financial operations. Here’s the crux: it eliminates the hassle of traditional expense management. No more convoluted expense reports and delays; each employee receives a corporate card for easy transactions, whether for travel, vendors, or subscriptions.

Key offerings include:

1. **Corporate Cards**: 
   - Physical and virtual cards for varied uses.
   - Built-in spending controls to prevent over-expenditure.

2. **Expense Management**:
   - Real-time tracking of expenses via a single dashboard.
   - Automated expense claims through a mobile app for hassle-free reimbursements.

3. **Procurement and Accounts Payable**:
   - Streamlined invoicing and vendor payment processes.
   - A robust system for tracking procurement from start to finish.

4. **Accounting Automation**:
   - Seamless integrations with popular ERP systems like Xero, Quickbooks, and Netsuite to keep financial records up-to-date.
   - Multi-currency capabilities to facilitate domestic and international transactions.

5. **Advanced Approvals**:
   - Customizable approval workflows to enhance security and reduce errors in the payment process.

**Building Trust and Security**

Volopay takes security seriously. Their platform is SOC 2 compliant, ISO 27001 certified, and adheres to strict PCI DSS guidelines for data safety. They engage trusted, licensed partners for money management, ensuring that client funds are protected and segregated from their operational funds.

**Current Traction**

Their clientele includes notable names like Reddoorz and Dathena, underscoring their foothold in significant markets across Southeast Asia. They also emphasize the importance of customer success stories as real testimonials of their operational efficiency and value delivery.

**The Takeaway**

In a world where time is currency, Volopay is effectively transforming the way businesses handle their financial operations. By simplifying spend management and automating tedious processes, they allow companies to focus on what really matters — growth and innovation. As they continue to grow, leveraging their experience and insights, Volopay is poised to carve out an influential niche in the rapidly evolving fintech landscape.

To explore more, check out their website at [Volopay](https://www.volopay.com/).
